properties.title: Maven OS X Application Bundle plugin changelog
properties.author: Eirik Bjorsnos

release.action: Bundle creation fails on OS X without developer tools installed
Allow additional resources to be included in the zip/dmg distributions
Add a .DS_Store how-to on the project website.
Don't hardcode the CFBundleExecutable name to "JavaApplicationStub"
Attach DMG and ZIP files so that they are installed/deployed.
Add flag to internet-enable the DMG.
dictionaryFile must now be absolute, like this: ${basedir}/src/resources/Info.plist.template.
Added vmOptions parameter that can be used to give parameters to the JVM.
Use plexus-mainclass-finder to automatically find a main class if none is configured.
Ability to add custom classpath elements.
Upgrade to Mojo parent pom 16 that includes site template.
